alert.note: Alert for Northern Lake County; Orange; Osceola; Southern Lake County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 23 at 12:15PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Lake, western Orange and northwestern Osceola Counties through 1245 PM EDT... At 1214 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles east of Bushnell to near Groveland to Lake Louisa to 9 miles southwest of Champions Gate. Movement was northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Orlando, Kissimmee, Apopka, Ocoee, Winter Garden, Leesburg, Eustis, Tavares, Mount Dora, Groveland, Mascotte, Windermere, Howey-In-the-hills, Bay Lake, Celebration, Lake Griffin, Lisbon, Ferndale, Zellwood and Lake Harris. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Northern Lake County; Orange; Osceola; Southern Lake County
